document.full_text: alabama's troubled jefferson county says it may have to lay off up to 1,000 workers due to a $70 million shortfall in its operating revenue that is adding to its chronic debt problems.
document.title: alabama's jefferson county mulls public worker layoffs
lines_and_colors: alabama's troubled jefferson county says it may have to lay off up to 1,000 workers due to a $70 million shortfall in its operating revenue that is adding to its chronic debt problems.
